column3: Pretty hot. So hot you might get burned.
The belt seems to radiate power. Your strikes will land harder.
You can see further with these.
Some nice smelling herbs. Good for relaxing. Heal more.
Steel helmet with a visor. Protects well, obstructs vision.
Seems very sharp, but enemies might get provoked by it.
Looks like a scythe with a bone as the handle. Glows spookily.
